detaileddescription.para: String containing the CVS revision. Read out via reflection!
Constant representing the name of the genotype XML element tag.
Constant representing the name of the chromosome XML element tag.
Constant representing the name of the gene XML element tag.
Constant representing the name of the gene XML element tag.
Constant representing the name of the size XML attribute that is added to genotype and chromosome elements to describe their size.
Constant representing the fully-qualified name of the concrete Gene class that was marshalled.
Shared DocumentBuilder, which is used to create new DOM Document instances.
Shared lock object used for synchronization purposes.
Private constructor. All methods in this class are static, so no construction is allowed.
Marshall a Chromosome instance to an XML Document representation, including its contained Gene instances.

parameterdescription.para: the chromosome to represent as an XML document

simplesect.para: a Document object representing the given Chromosome

detaileddescription.para: Marshall a Genotype to an XML Document representation, including its population of Chromosome instances.

parameterdescription.para: the genotype to represent as an XML document

simplesect.para: a Document object representing the given Genotype

detaileddescription.para: Marshall an array of Genes to an XML Element representation.

parameterdescription.para: the genes to represent as an XML element
a Document instance that will be used to create the Element instance. Note that the element will NOT be added to the document by this method

simplesect.para: an Element object representing the given genes

detaileddescription.para: Marshall a Chromosome instance to an XML Element representation, including its contained Genes as sub-elements. This may be useful in scenarios where representation as an entire Document is undesirable, such as when the representation of this Chromosome is to be combined with other elements in a single Document.

parameterdescription.para: the chromosome to represent as an XML element
a Document instance that will be used to create the Element instance. Note that the element will NOT be added to the document by this method

simplesect.para: an Element object representing the given Chromosome

detaileddescription.para: Marshall a Genotype instance into an XML Element representation, including its population of Chromosome instances as sub-elements. This may be useful in scenarios where representation as an entire Document is undesirable, such as when the representation of this Genotype is to be combined with other elements in a single Document.

parameterdescription.para: the genotype to represent as an XML element
a Document instance that will be used to create the Element instance. Note that the element will NOT be added to the document by this method

simplesect.para: an Element object representing the given Genotype

detaileddescription.para: Unmarshall a Chromosome instance from a given XML Element representation.

parameterdescription.para: current Configuration object
the XML Element representation of the Chromosome

simplesect.para: a new Chromosome instance setup with the data from the XML Element representation

parameterdescription.para: if the given Element is improperly structured or missing data
if the actively configured Gene implementation does not support the string representation of the alleles used in the given XML document
if there is a problem creating or populating a Gene instance

detaileddescription.para: Unmarshall a Chromosome instance from a given XML Element representation.

parameterdescription.para: the current active Configuration object that is to be used during construction of the Chromosome
the XML Element representation of the Chromosome

simplesect.para: a new Chromosome instance setup with the data from the XML Element representation

parameterdescription.para: if the given Element is improperly structured or missing data
if the given Configuration is in an inconsistent state
if the actively configured Gene implementation does not support the string representation of the alleles used in the given XML document
if there is a problem creating or populating a Gene instance

detaileddescription.para: Unmarshall a Genotype instance from a given XML Element representation. Its population of Chromosomes will be unmarshalled from the Chromosome sub-elements.

parameterdescription.para: the current active Configuration object that is to be used during construction of the Genotype and Chromosome instances
the XML Element representation of the Genotype

simplesect.para: a new Genotype instance, complete with a population of Chromosomes, setup with the data from the XML Element representation

parameterdescription.para: if the given Element is improperly structured or missing data
if the given Configuration is in an inconsistent state
if the actively configured Gene implementation does not support the string representation of the alleles used in the given XML document
if there is a problem creating or populating a Gene instance

detaileddescription.para: Unmarshall a Genotype instance from a given XML Document representation. Its population of Chromosomes will be unmarshalled from the Chromosome sub-elements.

parameterdescription.para: the current active Configuration object that is to be used during construction of the Genotype and Chromosome instances
the XML Document representation of the Genotype

simplesect.para: A new Genotype instance, complete with a population of Chromosomes, setup with the data from the XML Document representation

parameterdescription.para: if the given Document is improperly structured or missing data
if the given Configuration is in an inconsistent state
if the actively configured Gene implementation does not support the string representation of the alleles used in the given XML document
if there is a problem creating or populating a Gene instance

detaileddescription.para: Unmarshall a Chromosome instance from a given XML Document representation. Its genes will be unmarshalled from the gene sub-elements.

parameterdescription.para: the current active Configuration object that is to be used during construction of the Chromosome instances
the XML Document representation of the Chromosome

simplesect.para: a new Chromosome instance setup with the data from the XML Document representation

parameterdescription.para: if the given Document is improperly structured or missing data
if the given Configuration is in an inconsistent state
if the actively configured Gene implementation does not support the string representation of the alleles used in the given XML document
if there is a problem creating or populating a Gene instance

detaileddescription.para: Reads in an XML file and returns a Document object.

parameterdescription.para: the file to be read in

detaileddescription.para: Writes an XML file from a Document object.

parameterdescription.para: the Document object to be written to file
the file to be written
Document

detaileddescription.para: The XMLManager performs marshalling of genetic entity instances (such as Chromosomes and Genotypes) to XML representations of those entities, as well as unmarshalling. All of the methods in this class are static, so no construction is required (or allowed).
